info.title: Assignment
info.description: This API enables you to manage assignments in SAP S/4HANA Cloud for projects, resource management. You can create new assignments or update and delete existing ones. You can also read assignments, either of resources to monitor their utilization or of resource requests to check the staffing status.

x-sap-shortText: Manage assignments for resource requests and resources.

host.description: Your host where SAP S/4HANA Cloud for projects, resource management is deployed

environment.description: Your defined environment for SAP S/4HANA Cloud for projects, resource management account

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_BatchRequests).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET Assignments HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--

error_400.description: Bad Request - You have provided an invalid request parameter or the payload does not match the expected format. See error message for details.

error_401.description: Unauthorized - No valid access token (JWT) has been provided or it has expired.

error_403.description: Forbidden - You do not have the necessary authorization to perform this action or to access the requested resource.

error_404.description: Not found - The requested resource does not exist.

error_409.description: Conflict - Could not create the resource, due to a conflict with an existing one (e.g. a unique value was provided that is already used). See error message for details.

OAuth2.description: OAuth client credentials (client ID and secret) are required.
